Interface IBasicTradeProperties

Namespace
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Market
Assembly
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Market.dll

Represents a read-only interface that exposes a basic information regarding a trade Trade

public interface IBasicTradeProperties : IInstrumentProvider, ITradeQuantityProvider, IQuantityProvider, IProfitProvider, ITimeZoneProvider
Inherited Members
IInstrumentProvider.Instrument
ITradeQuantityProvider.TradeAction
IQuantityProvider.Quantity
IProfitProvider.Profit
IProfitProvider.NetProfit
IProfitProvider.Fee
IProfitProvider.Commission
IProfitProvider.Currency
ITimeZoneProvider.TimeZone
Extension Methods
IBasicTradePropertiesExtensions.FormatToString(IBasicTradeProperties)
ITradeQuantityProviderExtensions.GetSignedQuantity(ITradeQuantityProvider)

Remarks

Quantity means the quantity of exit (and the total quantity of the deal accordingly) Profit is a pure profit that calculates as a difference between entry price and exit price It does not include fees (Fee) and commissions (Commission) NetProfit is: Profit + Commission+Fee

Properties

AlgoKey

Name of initiator of order that made this execution part.

string? AlgoKey { get; }

Property Value

string

EntryPrice

Price of entry. If there we several entries, this is an average price

double EntryPrice { get; }

Property Value

double

EntryTime

For netting accounts this is the time of the last entry For hedging accounts this is the time of opening position

DateTime EntryTime { get; }

Property Value

DateTime

ExitPrice

The price of exit position and making deal.

double ExitPrice { get; }

Property Value

double

ExitTime

The price of exit position and making deal.

DateTime ExitTime { get; }

Property Value

DateTime

StopLoss

Stop loss If take profit is not set or is not supported by broker, the value is NaN

double StopLoss { get; }

Property Value

double

StrategyName

Name of strategy that placed order that made this execution part.

string? StrategyName { get; }

Property Value

string

TakeProfit

Take profit If take profit is not set or is not supported by broker, the value is NaN

double TakeProfit { get; }

Property Value

double

TradeId

Depends on provider

string TradeId { get; }
